card.name: Ancestor's Chosen
card.property: First strike (This creature deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.) When Ancestor's Chosen enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life for each card in your graveyard.

card.name: Anger
card.property: Haste As long as Anger is in your graveyard and you control a Mountain, creatures you control have haste.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "For its time as a mortal, Anger chose a shell of boiling rock."—Scroll of Beginnings

card.name: Anurid Barkripper
card.property: Threshold — Anurid Barkripper gets +2/+2 as long as seven or more cards are in your graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When it croaks, so do you.

card.name: Anurid Brushhopper
card.property: Discard two cards: Exile Anurid Brushhopper. Return it to the battlefield under its owner's control at the beginning of the next end step.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It's so tough it can frighten itself into hiding.

card.name: Anurid Swarmsnapper
card.property: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.) {1}{G}: Anurid Swarmsnapper can block an additional creature this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Anurids have the problem of airborne invaders licked.

card.name: Arcane Teachings
card.property: Enchant creature (Target a creature as you cast this. This card enters the battlefield attached to that creature.) Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has "{T}: This creature deals 1 damage to target creature or player."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Dwarves may teach at the speed of stone, but their results are solid.

card.name: Aven Fogbringer
card.property: Flying When Aven Fogbringer enters the battlefield, return target land to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I cover the land with blankets and it sleeps."

card.name: Aven Warcraft
card.property: Creatures you control get +0/+2 until end of turn. Threshold — If seven or more cards are in your graveyard, choose a color. Creatures you control also gain protection from the chosen color until end of turn.

card.name: Balthor the Defiled
card.property: Minion creatures get +1/+1. {B}{B}{B}, Exile Balthor the Defiled: Each player returns all black and all red creature cards from his or her graveyard to the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: He remembers enough of his life to weep for what he has lost.

card.name: Barbarian Bully
card.property: Discard a card at random: Barbarian Bully gets +2/+2 until end of turn unless a player has Barbarian Bully deal 4 damage to him or her. Activate this ability only once each turn.

card.name: Battle Screech
card.property: Create two 1/1 white Bird creature tokens with flying. Flashback—Tap three untapped white creatures you control. (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

card.name: Battlefield Scrounger
card.property: Threshold — Put three cards from your graveyard on the bottom of your library: Battlefield Scrounger gets +3/+3 until end of turn. Activate this ability only once each turn and only if seven or more cards are in your graveyard.

card.name: Battlewise Aven
card.property: Flying Threshold — As long as seven or more cards are in your graveyard, Battlewise Aven gets +1/+1 and has first strike.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Experience is a good teacher, not a kind one.

card.name: Benevolent Bodyguard
card.property: Sacrifice Benevolent Bodyguard: Target creature you control gains protection from the color of your choice until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "My destiny is to save others so their destinies may be achieved."

card.name: Book Burning
card.property: Any player may have Book Burning deal 6 damage to him or her. If no one does, target player puts the top six cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The wizard's spellbook was full of burning questions.

card.name: Border Patrol
card.property: Vigilance

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We have been victims of treachery, of the Cabal, and of our own ambitions. No more."—Commander Eesha

card.name: Brawn
card.property: Trample As long as Brawn is in your graveyard and you control a Forest, creatures you control have trample.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "'I have arrived,' bellowed Brawn, and the plane shuddered."—Scroll of Beginnings

card.name: Breaking Point
card.property: Any player may have Breaking Point deal 6 damage to him or her. If no one does, destroy all creatures. Creatures destroyed this way can't be regenerated.

card.name: Browbeat
card.property: Any player may have Browbeat deal 5 damage to him or her. If no one does, target player draws three cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Even the threat of power has power."—Jeska, warrior adept

card.name: Burning Wish
card.property: You may choose a sorcery card you own from outside the game, reveal that card, and put it into your hand. Exile Burning Wish.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: She wished for a weapon, but not for the skill to wield it.

card.name: Cabal Therapy
card.property: Choose a nonland card name. Target player reveals his or her hand and discards all cards with that name. Flashback—Sacrifice a creature. (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

card.name: Cabal Trainee
card.property: Sacrifice Cabal Trainee: Target creature gets -2/-0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Ah, a faceshredder. Very rare. Nearly unstoppable. Good luck"—Cabal instructor

card.name: Cagemail
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and can't attack.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Power often costs too high a price."—Commander Eesha

card.name: Canopy Claws
card.property: Target creature loses flying until end of turn. Flashback {G} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

card.name: Centaur Rootcaster
card.property: Whenever Centaur Rootcaster deals combat damage to a player, you may search your library for a basic land card and put that card onto the battlefield tapped. If you do, shuffle your library.

card.name: Cephalid Constable
card.property: Whenever Cephalid Constable deals combat damage to a player, return up to that many target permanents that player controls to their owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Cephalids don't police people. They police loyalties.

card.name: Cephalid Inkshrouder
card.property: Discard a card: Cephalid Inkshrouder gains shroud until end of turn and can't be blocked this turn. (A creature with shroud can't be the target of spells or abilities.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Cephalids shrink from the harsh glare of scrutiny.

card.name: Chastise
card.property: Destroy target attacking creature. You gain life equal to its power.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Why do we pray to the Ancestor? Because She listens."—Mystic elder

card.name: Commander Eesha
card.property: Flying, protection from creatures

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "War glides on the simplest updrafts while peace struggles against hurricane winds. It is the way of the world. It must change."

card.name: Crush of Wurms
card.property: Create three 6/6 green Wurm creature tokens. Flashback {9}{G}{G}{G} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

card.name: Cunning Wish
card.property: You may choose an instant card you own from outside the game, reveal that card, and put it into your hand. Exile Cunning Wish.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: He wished for knowledge, but not for the will to apply it.

card.name: Death Wish
card.property: You may choose a card you own from outside the game and put it into your hand. You lose half your life, rounded up. Exile Death Wish.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: He wished for power, but not for the longevity to abuse it.

card.name: Defy Gravity
card.property: Target creature gains flying until end of turn. Flashback {U} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Magical or not, it's still a cloud.

card.name: Dwarven Bloodboiler
card.property: Tap an untapped Dwarf you control: Target creature gets +2/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: His battle cry unleashes an avalanche of dwarves.

card.name: Dwarven Driller
card.property: {T}: Destroy target land unless its controller has Dwarven Driller deal 2 damage to him or her.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Drill the planet, it's no trouble:Mining granite, making rubble."—Dwarven drilling song

card.name: Dwarven Scorcher
card.property: Sacrifice Dwarven Scorcher: Dwarven Scorcher deals 1 damage to target creature unless that creature's controller has Dwarven Scorcher deal 2 damage to him or her.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Barbarians invented the blaze of glory. Dwarves perfected it.

card.name: Earsplitting Rats
card.property: When Earsplitting Rats enters the battlefield, each player discards a card. Discard a card: Regenerate Earsplitting Rats.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Rats come in one amount: too many.

card.name: Elephant Guide
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +3/+3. When enchanted creature dies, create a 3/3 green Elephant creature token.

card.name: Ember Shot
card.property: Ember Shot deals 3 damage to target creature or player. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Dwarves bring poor coal to market, use good coal in their homes, and throw their best coal away.

card.name: Envelop
card.property: Counter target sorcery spell.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "What you made will be unmade. What you learned will be unlearned. And when you're done, you will be undone."—Ambassador Laquatus

card.name: Epic Struggle
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, if you control twenty or more creatures, you win the game.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "If our foes will not listen to words, perhaps hooves and claws will make them take notice."—Seton, centaur druid

card.name: Erhnam Djinn
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, target non-Wall creature an opponent controls gains forestwalk until your next upkeep. (It can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Forest.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: He provides a safe path to nowhere.

card.name: Exoskeletal Armor
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +X/+X, where X is the number of creature cards in all graveyards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We use only what we need—but in times of strife, our need becomes great."—Centaur warrior

card.name: Filth
card.property: Swampwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Swamp.) As long as Filth is in your graveyard and you control a Swamp, creatures you control have swampwalk.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "As the portal closed, Filth oozed through. The stench of evil followed it in."—Scroll of Beginnings

card.name: Firecat Blitz
card.property: Create X 1/1 red Elemental Cat creature tokens with haste. Exile them at the beginning of the next end step. Flashback—{R}{R}, Sacrifice X Mountains. (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

card.name: Flaring Pain
card.property: Damage can't be prevented this turn. Flashback {R} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I don't rub salt in wounds. I use sulfur."—Matoc, lavamancer

card.name: Flash of Insight
card.property: Look at the top X cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order. Flashback—{1}{U}, Exile X blue cards from your graveyard. (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost, then exile it. You can't exile Flash of Insight to pay for its own flashback cost.)

card.name: Fledgling Dragon
card.property: Flying Threshold — As long as seven or more cards are in your graveyard, Fledgling Dragon gets +3/+3 and has "{R}: Fledgling Dragon gets +1/+0 until end of turn."

card.name: Folk Medicine
card.property: You gain 1 life for each creature you control. Flashback {1}{W} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

card.name: Forcemage Advocate
card.property: {T}: Return target card from an opponent's graveyard to his or her hand. Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.

card.name: Funeral Pyre
card.property: Exile target card from a graveyard. Its owner creates a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Raze the body. Raise the soul."—Mystic elder

card.name: Genesis
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, if Genesis is in your graveyard, you may pay {2}{G}. If you do, return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "First through the Riftstone was Genesis—and the world was lifeless no more."—Scroll of Beginnings

card.name: Giant Warthog
card.property: Trample

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "When the Ancestor saw the cruelty her human children were capable of, Her fury shook the world. From this outburst sprang the warthogs."—Nomad myth

card.name: Glory
card.property: Flying {2}{W}: Choose a color. Creatures you control gain protection from the chosen color until end of turn. Activate this ability only if Glory is in your graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Glory was gone; Glory was everywhere."—Scroll of Beginnings

card.name: Golden Wish
card.property: You may choose an artifact or enchantment card you own from outside the game, reveal that card, and put it into your hand. Exile Golden Wish.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: She wished for nobility, but not for a nation to honor it.

card.name: Goretusk Firebeast
card.property: When Goretusk Firebeast enters the battlefield, it deals 4 damage to target player.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: As a youth, Kamahl took one for a pet. His hair has yet to grow back.

card.name: Grave Consequences
card.property: Each player may exile any number of cards from his or her graveyard. Then each player loses 1 life for each card in his or her graveyard. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You call that a nightmare?"—Braids, dementia summoner

card.name: Grip of Amnesia
card.property: Counter target spell unless its controller exiles all cards from his or her graveyard. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Would you abandon your past to save your future?"—Ambassador Laquatus

card.name: Grizzly Fate
card.property: Create two 2/2 green Bear creature tokens. Threshold — Create four 2/2 green Bear creature tokens instead if seven or more cards are in your graveyard. Flashback {5}{G}{G} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

card.name: Guided Strike
card.property: Target creature gets +1/+0 and gains first strike until end of turn. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "May the Ancestor strengthen my hand and guide my blade."—Nomad war prayer

card.name: Guiltfeeder
card.property: Fear (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.) Whenever Guiltfeeder attacks and isn't blocked, defending player loses 1 life for each card in his or her graveyard.

card.name: Hapless Researcher
card.property: Sacrifice Hapless Researcher: Draw a card, then discard a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Scholars possess such lofty knowledge that it shouldn't be surprising when they fall.

card.name: Harvester Druid
card.property: {T}: Add to your mana pool one mana of any color that a land you control could produce.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "In the end, the same soil lies atop the field, within the mountain, and under the sea."

card.name: Hunting Grounds
card.property: Threshold — As long as seven or more cards are in your graveyard, Hunting Grounds has "Whenever an opponent casts a spell, you may put a creature card from your hand onto the battlefield."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In the heavy hush of Krosa, drawing on mana is like ringing a dinner bell.

card.name: Infectious Rage
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +2/-1. When enchanted creature dies, choose a creature at random Infectious Rage can enchant. Return Infectious Rage to the battlefield attached to that creature.

card.name: Ironshell Beetle
card.property: When Ironshell Beetle enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Why waste time creating weapons? Nature provides us with all we need."—Centaur warrior

card.name: Jeska, Warrior Adept
card.property: First strike, haste {T}: Jeska, Warrior Adept deals 1 damage to target creature or player.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "My brother and I both come from Balthor's forge. Kamahl has a temper of fire. I have a temper of steel."

card.name: Keep Watch
card.property: Draw a card for each attacking creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I see their moral dilemmas. I see their raw courage. I see their self-sacrifice. I see our victory."

card.name: Krosan Reclamation
card.property: Target player shuffles up to two target cards from his or her graveyard into his or her library. Flashback {1}{G} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

card.name: Krosan Verge
card.property: Krosan Verge enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool. {2}, {T}, Sacrifice Krosan Verge: Search your library for a Forest card and a Plains card and put them onto the battlefield tapped. Then shuffle your library.

card.name: Krosan Wayfarer
card.property: Sacrifice Krosan Wayfarer: You may put a land card from your hand onto the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The Krosan Forest lives, and druids are its seeds."—Seton, centaur druid

card.name: Laquatus's Disdain
card.property: Counter target spell cast from a graveyard. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The first time was amusing, but now you're getting tiresome."

card.name: Lava Dart
card.property: Lava Dart deals 1 damage to target creature or player. Flashback—Sacrifice a Mountain. (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

card.name: Lead Astray
card.property: Tap up to two target creatures.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Never underestimate our enemy's strength, brutality, . . . or stupidity."—Commander Eesha

card.name: Liberated Dwarf
card.property: {R}, Sacrifice Liberated Dwarf: Target green creature gets +1/+0 and gains first strike until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Freed from their chains, these dwarves are bound only by honor.

card.name: Lightning Surge
card.property: Lightning Surge deals 4 damage to target creature or player. Threshold — If seven or more cards are in your graveyard, instead Lightning Surge deals 6 damage to that creature or player and the damage can't be prevented. Flashback {5}{R}{R} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

card.name: Living Wish
card.property: You may choose a creature or land card you own from outside the game, reveal that card, and put it into your hand. Exile Living Wish.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: He wished for growth, but not for a way to control it.

card.name: Lost in Thought
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature can't attack or block, and its activated abilities can't be activated. Its controller may exile three cards from his or her graveyard for that player to ignore this effect until end of turn.

card.name: Masked Gorgon
card.property: Green creatures and white creatures have protection from Gorgons. Threshold — Masked Gorgon has protection from green and from white as long as seven or more cards are in your graveyard.

card.name: Mental Note
card.property: Put the top two cards of your library into your graveyard. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Some minds are more open than others.

card.name: Mirari's Wake
card.property: Creatures you control get +1/+1. Whenever you tap a land for mana, add one mana to your mana pool of any type that land produced.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The land drank power from the Mirari as though it had thirsted forever.

card.name: Mirror Wall
card.property: Defender (This creature can't attack.) {W}: Mirror Wall can attack this turn as though it didn't have defender.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Breaking it would be about four hundred years bad luck."—Nomad sentry

card.name: Mist of Stagnation
card.property: Permanents don't untap during their controllers' untap steps. At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player chooses a permanent for each card in his or her graveyard, then untaps those permanents.

card.name: Morality Shift
card.property: Exchange your graveyard and library. Then shuffle your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The mind sings, though at times it sings a dirge.

card.name: Nantuko Monastery
card.property: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool. Threshold — {G}{W}: Nantuko Monastery becomes a 4/4 green and white Insect Monk creature with first strike until end of turn. It's still a land. Activate this ability only if seven or more cards are in your graveyard.

card.name: Nantuko Tracer
card.property: When Nantuko Tracer enters the battlefield, you may put target card from a graveyard on the bottom of its owner's library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Your past is a map to where you will go.—Nantuko teaching

card.name: Nomad Mythmaker
card.property: {W}, {T}: Put target Aura card from a graveyard onto the battlefield under your control attached to a creature you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Nomads weave tales thicker than tapestries.

card.name: Nullmage Advocate
card.property: {T}: Return two target cards from an opponent's graveyard to his or her hand. Destroy target artifact or enchantment.

card.name: Phantom Centaur
card.property: Protection from black Phantom Centaur enters the battlefield with three +1/+1 counters on it. If damage would be dealt to Phantom Centaur, prevent that damage. Remove a +1/+1 counter from Phantom Centaur.

card.name: Phantom Flock
card.property: Flying Phantom Flock enters the battlefield with three +1/+1 counters on it. If damage would be dealt to Phantom Flock, prevent that damage. Remove a +1/+1 counter from Phantom Flock.

card.name: Phantom Nantuko
card.property: Trample Phantom Nantuko enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it. If damage would be dealt to Phantom Nantuko, prevent that damage. Remove a +1/+1 counter from Phantom Nantuko. {T}: Put a +1/+1 counter on Phantom Nantuko.

card.name: Phantom Nishoba
card.property: Trample Phantom Nishoba enters the battlefield with seven +1/+1 counters on it. Whenever Phantom Nishoba deals damage, you gain that much life. If damage would be dealt to Phantom Nishoba, prevent that damage. Remove a +1/+1 counter from Phantom Nishoba.

card.name: Phantom Nomad
card.property: Phantom Nomad enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it. If damage would be dealt to Phantom Nomad, prevent that damage. Remove a +1/+1 counter from Phantom Nomad.

card.name: Phantom Tiger
card.property: Phantom Tiger enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it. If damage would be dealt to Phantom Tiger, prevent that damage. Remove a +1/+1 counter from Phantom Tiger.

card.name: Planar Chaos
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, flip a coin. If you lose the flip, sacrifice Planar Chaos. Whenever a player casts a spell, that player flips a coin. If he or she loses the flip, counter that spell.

card.name: Prismatic Strands
card.property: Prevent all damage that sources of the color of your choice would deal this turn. Flashback—Tap an untapped white creature you control. (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

card.name: Pulsemage Advocate
card.property: {T}: Return three target cards from an opponent's graveyard to his or her hand. Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield.

card.name: Quiet Speculation
card.property: Search target player's library for up to three cards with flashback and put them into that player's graveyard. Then the player shuffles his or her library.

card.name: Rats' Feast
card.property: Exile X target cards from a single graveyard.

card.name: Ray of Revelation
card.property: Destroy target enchantment. Flashback {G} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Webs of illusion unravel in the light of truth.

card.name: Riftstone Portal
card.property: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool. As long as Riftstone Portal is in your graveyard, lands you control have "{T}: Add {G} or {W} to your mana pool."

card.name: Scalpelexis
card.property: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.) Whenever Scalpelexis deals combat damage to a player, that player exiles the top four cards of his or her library. If two or more of those cards have the same name, repeat this process.

card.name: Seedtime
card.property: Cast Seedtime only during your turn. Take an extra turn after this one if an opponent cast a blue spell this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The hippo grows wings to fight the condor.—Nantuko teaching

card.name: Selfless Exorcist
card.property: {T}: Exile target creature card from a graveyard. That card deals damage equal to its power to Selfless Exorcist.

card.name: Serene Sunset
card.property: Prevent all combat damage X target creatures would deal this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The armies paused, silent, as the warriors reflected on the sunsets of their youth.

card.name: Shaman's Trance
card.property: Other players can't cast spells or play lands from their graveyards this turn. You may play cards from other players' graveyards this turn as though those cards were in your graveyard.

card.name: Shieldmage Advocate
card.property: {T}: Return target card from an opponent's graveyard to his or her hand. Prevent all damage that would be dealt to target creature or player this turn by a source of your choice.

card.name: Silver Seraph
card.property: Flying Threshold — Other creatures you control get +2/+2 as long as seven or more cards are in your graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A symbol of hope for hopeless times.

card.name: Solitary Confinement
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Solitary Confinement unless you discard a card. Skip your draw step. You have shroud. (You can't be the target of spells or abilities.) Prevent all damage that would be dealt to you.

card.name: Soulcatchers' Aerie
card.property: Whenever a Bird is put into your graveyard from the battlefield, put a feather counter on Soulcatchers' Aerie. Bird creatures get +1/+1 for each feather counter on Soulcatchers' Aerie.

card.name: Soulgorger Orgg
card.property: Trample When Soulgorger Orgg enters the battlefield, you lose all but 1 life. When Soulgorger Orgg leaves the battlefield, you gain life equal to the life you lost when it entered the battlefield.

card.name: Spellgorger Barbarian
card.property: When Spellgorger Barbarian enters the battlefield, discard a card at random. When Spellgorger Barbarian leaves the battlefield, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The epidemic insanity had a lasting effect on certain barbarians—but no one noticed.

card.name: Spelljack
card.property: Counter target spell. If that spell is countered this way, exile it instead of putting it into its owner's graveyard. You may play it without paying its mana cost for as long as it remains exiled. (If it has X in its mana cost, X is 0.)

card.name: Spirit Cairn
card.property: Whenever a player discards a card, you may pay {W}. If you do, create a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It marks the border between here and hereafter.

card.name: Spurnmage Advocate
card.property: {T}: Return two target cards from an opponent's graveyard to his or her hand. Destroy target attacking creature.

card.name: Stitch Together
card.property: Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand. Threshold — Return that card from your graveyard to the battlefield instead if seven or more cards are in your graveyard.

card.name: Sudden Strength
card.property: Target creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Mirari's magic transformed the Krosan Forest—and its inhabitants.

card.name: Suntail Hawk
card.property: Flying

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Our forebears once flew like this—carefree, needing nothing but a warm nest and a full belly. Our intellect may be more burden than blessing."—Commander Eesha

card.name: Sutured Ghoul
card.property: Trample As Sutured Ghoul enters the battlefield, exile any number of creature cards from your graveyard. Sutured Ghoul's power is equal to the total power of the exiled cards and its toughness is equal to their total toughness.

card.name: Swelter
card.property: Swelter deals 2 damage to each of two target creatures.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: No circle has a beginning, but many have foreseeable ends.

card.name: Swirling Sandstorm
card.property: Threshold — Swirling Sandstorm deals 5 damage to each creature without flying if seven or more cards are in your graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: As dust swept out, vultures swept in.

card.name: Sylvan Safekeeper
card.property: Sacrifice a land: Target creature you control gains shroud until end of turn. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "How could someone so small cause so much trouble?"—Nomad sentry

card.name: Telekinetic Bonds
card.property: Whenever a player discards a card, you may pay {1}{U}. If you do, you may tap or untap target permanent.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Nature's been fired. The oceans are under new management."—Ambassador Laquatus

card.name: Test of Endurance
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, if you have 50 or more life, you win the game.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "If we have learned nothing else, we have learned to survive."—Mystic elder

card.name: Thriss, Nantuko Primus
card.property: {G}, {T}: Target creature gets +5/+5 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "When you live for others, you live for yourself."

card.name: Toxic Stench
card.property: Target nonblack creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn. Threshold — If seven or more cards are in your graveyard, instead destroy that creature. It can't be regenerated.

card.name: Trained Pronghorn
card.property: Discard a card: Prevent all damage that would be dealt to Trained Pronghorn this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The desert asked the Ancestor for children, and the antelope were born."—Nomad myth

card.name: Treacherous Vampire
card.property: Flying Whenever Treacherous Vampire attacks or blocks, sacrifice it unless you exile a card from your graveyard. Threshold — As long as seven or more cards are in your graveyard, Treacherous Vampire gets +2/+2 and has "When Treacherous Vampire dies, you lose 6 life."

card.name: Treacherous Werewolf
card.property: Threshold — As long as seven or more cards are in your graveyard, Treacherous Werewolf gets +2/+2 and has "When Treacherous Werewolf dies, you lose 4 life."

card.name: Tunneler Wurm
card.property: Discard a card: Regenerate Tunneler Wurm.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: If an anurid's lucky, it'll find a warm tunnel for bedtime. If a wurm's lucky, it'll find a warm anurid for breakfast.

card.name: Unquestioned Authority
card.property: Enchant creature When Unquestioned Authority enters the battlefield, draw a card. Enchanted creature has protection from creatures.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Only the Ancestor should be revered."—Mystic heretic

card.name: Valor
card.property: First strike As long as Valor is in your graveyard and you control a Plains, creatures you control have first strike.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The cracks widened, the shell crumbled, and Valor spread throughout the land."—Scroll of Beginnings

card.name: Venomous Vines
card.property: Destroy target enchanted permanent.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "True strength comes from within. The false promise of unnatural power only incurs Krosa's wrath."—Seton, centaur druid

card.name: Vigilant Sentry
card.property: Threshold — As long as seven or more cards are in your graveyard, Vigilant Sentry gets +1/+1 and has "{T}: Target attacking or blocking creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn."

card.name: Web of Inertia
card.property: At the beginning of combat on each opponent's turn, that player may exile a card from his or her graveyard. If the player doesn't, creatures he or she controls can't attack you this turn.

card.name: Wonder
card.property: Flying As long as Wonder is in your graveyard and you control an Island, creatures you control have flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The awestruck birds gazed at Wonder. Slowly, timidly, they rose into the air."—Scroll of Beginnings

card.name: Worldgorger Dragon
card.property: Flying, trample When Worldgorger Dragon enters the battlefield, exile all other permanents you control. When Worldgorger Dragon leaves the battlefield, return the exiled cards to the battlefield under their owners' control.

card.name: Wormfang Behemoth
card.property: When Wormfang Behemoth enters the battlefield, exile all cards from your hand. When Wormfang Behemoth leaves the battlefield, return the exiled cards to their owner's hand.

card.name: Wormfang Crab
card.property: Wormfang Crab can't be blocked. When Wormfang Crab enters the battlefield, an opponent chooses a permanent you control other than Wormfang Crab and exiles it. When Wormfang Crab leaves the battlefield, return the exiled card to the battlefield under its owner's control.

card.name: Wormfang Drake
card.property: Flying When Wormfang Drake enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you exile a creature you control other than Wormfang Drake. When Wormfang Drake leaves the battlefield, return the exiled card to the battlefield under its owner's control.

card.name: Wormfang Manta
card.property: Flying When Wormfang Manta enters the battlefield, you skip your next turn. When Wormfang Manta leaves the battlefield, you take an extra turn after this one.

card.name: Wormfang Newt
card.property: When Wormfang Newt enters the battlefield, exile a land you control. When Wormfang Newt leaves the battlefield, return the exiled card to the battlefield under its owner's control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Spawned by mages emulating the insane.

card.name: Wormfang Turtle
card.property: When Wormfang Turtle enters the battlefield, exile a land you control. When Wormfang Turtle leaves the battlefield, return the exiled card to the battlefield under its owner's control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Chainer's admirers keep his dreams alive.
